title: Integrated Culturally Responsive Online Instructional Design for Accelerated Middle School English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and comprehension of grammar/vocabulary at the 7th-grade level
context.additional_context: Design optimized for integrating cultural contexts and asynchronous learning activities for learners from multicultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate English reading/writing proficiency at the 9th-grade level within six months to qualify for early completion of advanced English courses.
Learners can critically analyze and discuss English texts that reflect cultural diversity.
Learners can autonomously manage peer assessment and feedback routines using digital platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
